summary: Teddy Shaw, a bored New York office girl, goes to a camp in the Catskill Mountains for rest and finds Chick Kirkland.
cast: Ginger Rogers|Douglas Fairbanks Jr.|Peggy Conklin|Lucille Ball|Lee Bowman|Eve Arden|Dorothea Kent|Red Skelton|Donald Meek|Jack Carson|Clarence Wilson|Allan Lane|Grady Sutton|Shimen Ruskin|Dorothy Tree|Leona Roberts|Harlan Briggs|Inez Courtney|Juanita Quigley|Ben Carter|Etienne Girardot|Margaret Seddon|Hooper Atchley|Arthur Aylesworth|Baby Peggy|Lynn Bailey|Bobby Barber|Wesley Barry|Mary Bovard|Stanley Brown|Elise Cavanna|George Cooper|William Corson|Walter Cosden|Frances Gifford|Russell Gleason|Vera Gordon|Ben Hall|Sam Harris|Mary Jane Irving|Dean Jagger|Marjorie Kane|Florence Lake|Vickie Lester|Cynthia Lindsay|Margaret McWade|George Meeker|Agnes Melcoll|Ann Miller|Dorothy Moore|Cleo Morgan|Marie Osborne|Robert Parrish|Steve Pendleton|Steve Putnam|Betty Jane Rhodes|Ronald R. title: Lo mejor de la vida
